title: Ventisquero
text: In <a href="Spanish%20language">Spanish language</a> a ventisquero is a zone in a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> where heavy <a href="snow">snow</a> accumulations occur. Before the term "glaciar" (Spanish for <a href="glacier">glacier</a>) became widespread many glaciers in <a href="Patagonia">Patagonia</a> were titled with ventisquero, such as <a href="Ventisquero%20Negro">Ventisquero Negro</a> or <a href="Grandes%20Ventisqueros">Grandes Ventisqueros</a>.
